name: Ask Alexa Multiple Choice Quiz | Name Game | 10 Questions

questions.text: Yes, I am Alexa Vega. I heard you want to know where I was born. Well, where was I was born?
questions.explanation:
Miami, FL.

	Vega was born on August 27, 1988. Although born in Florida, she moved to California with her family when she was four. She is an actress who started in the "SPY Kids" (2001) and its sequel movies, playing Carmen Cortez.  She is also a singer. One of her songs is "Heart Drive."

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa Chung. You want to know what my first book was. What was its title?
questions.explanation:
"It".

	"It" was released in 2013 and had to do with fashion. "It" is a collection of her writings, drawings, and photographs. Born November 5, 1983, Alexa Chung is a model, television presenter, fashion designer, and writer. She has been on the best-dressed list in multiple magazines.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexis Davalos. Oh, you'd like to know what my father's first name is. That's easy; what is it?
questions.explanation:
Jeff.

	Alexis Davalos was born May 28, 1982, to Elyssa Davalos and Jeff Dunas; he was born October 23, 1954, and is an American photographer of celebrities. Davalos played Andromeda in "Clash of the Titans" in 2010.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa Knierim. Yes, I am a figure skater. Oh, you want to know who my skating partner in 2021 was. Yes, I can tell you. What was his name?
questions.explanation:
Brandon Frazier.

	Alexa Knierim was born on June 10, 1991. In 2020, she and Frazier were the Skate America Champions; in 2021, they were the U.S. National Champion. Frazier was not her first skating partner; that was Ivan Dimitrov. After that, she skated with Chris Knierim at the suggestion of Dalilah Sappenfield, who was her coach. She ended up marrying Knierim in 2016. In 2020 Chris Knierim retired from skating due to injuries and depression, and Frazier became her partner.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa Ray Joel. Yes, my parents are famous as well. My dad is a singer and songwriter like me. Oh, I'm sorry. You were asking about my mother. I can tell you who she is and what she does.  Which is correct?
options: Condoleezza Rice - former US Secretary of State
Cathy Rigby - Olympian, played Peter Pan on stage many times
questions.explanation:
Christie Brinkley - model.

	Alexa Ray Joel was born on December 29, 1985. She sings "All I Can Do" and "Notice Me," among other songs. She is the daughter of Billy Joel, who wrote "Lullabye (Goodnight, My Angel)" for her in 1993. Her mother, Christie Brinkley, became famous in the late 1970s after appearing on the cover of "Sports Illustrated" three consecutive times starting in 1979. For twenty-five years, she was "the face of Cover Girl." She and Billy Joel were married from 1985-1994.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa Guarachi. Yes, I can tell you what two countries I have citizenship in. What are they are?
questions.explanation:
America and Chile.

	Alexa Guarachi was born on November 17, 1990, in Fort Walton Beach, Florida. She is a right-handed professional tennis player. Her father is Chilean, and her mother is American. Before 2015 she represented America in tennis, but she started representing Chile because her father was born there and she had family there.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa Davies. Yes, I am a Welsh actress. OH, you saw me in series one of "Harlots" and wonder who I played. Who did I play?
questions.explanation:
Betsey Fletcher.

	Alexa Davies was born August 18, 1995, in Rhuddlan, Country Denbighshire, Wales, UK. She played young Rose in "Mamma Mia: Here We Go Again" in 2018. She played Betsy Fletcher in series one of "Harlots" (2017-2019), a British drama series set in the 18th-century. Betsy was a sex worker on the show.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa McDonough. Yes, I was a member of Parliament in Canada. You were wondering in which province.  Which one is it?
questions.explanation:
Nova Scotia.

	Alexa McDonough was born on August 11, 1944, in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. In 1980 she became the first woman to lead a significant, recognized political party in Canada when elected to the Nova Scotia Democratic Party. She was an MP in Halifax, Nova Scotia, from June 2, 1997, to October 14, 2008. In 2009, she was appointed an Officer of the Order of Canada, the second-highest honor in that country.

questions.text: Hello, my name is Alexa Hennig von Lange. Why yes, I am an author. Ja, I can tell you. What was the name of my first book?
questions.explanation:
"Relax".

	Alexa Hennig von Lange was born on March 22, 1973, in Hannover, Germany. In 1995 she hosted a children's program on Kabel 1 called "Bim Bam Bino." She has written novels, non-fiction, children's books, and plays.  "Relax" is a German fiction book about Chris, who wants to be a rock star and "the little one" who wants to marry him.

questions.text: Hello. My name is Alexa von Porembsky. Ja, it's true, I have died. Where did I die?
questions.explanation:
Berlin.

	Alexa von Porembsky was born on June 5, 1906, in Soron, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress. She was in "Road to Rio" in 1931, "The Model Husband" (1937), "The Night of the Storm" in 1957, and many other movies. She died on August 18, 1981, at the age of 75 in Berlin, Germany.
